<br />


To protect against data loss due to disk failure, you can add second drive for raid-1, ensuring that if one disk fails, your second disk is available. You’ll be able to read and write to the second disk, and we can replace the failed disk to maintain data security.


Are you hosting provider and need cheap server management? Yes, we can, you're ready to sell hosting services without worrying about server configuration, we will manage entire server and you just need focus on your sales.


If you need custom server configuration, please contact our sales team or email us sales@ikihost.com. We will create a custom quote at our best possible price just for you.


Server orders will be setup within 12 hours from date of payment (we try on the same day).
